properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, x2
na tufurahi siku ya leo.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Alleluia - hoye),
tulitukuze jina la Bwana.
Hoyahe, x2
na tufurahi siku ya leo. x3
Tulitukuze Jina la Bwana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, x2
Mungu wetu ndiwe Baba Mfariji.
Kazi zako zote zinakusifu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tumshukuru kwa ajili ya Yesu,
aliye nasi lake taifa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tumpe Mungu,
enzi tukuzo
nguvu na heshima hata milele.
